attributes.action: Create a space on the ballot form to enable us to vote "no confidence in any party"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of people do not bother to vote because they cannot have faith in any M.P.s, especially after the expenses scandal. Whilst we appreciate that there are many good M.P.s' who have not exploited the tax-payers, there are a greater number laughing all the way to the bank. I feel that I have lost confidence in our voting system and, being a lifelong voter, would like a chance to show my lack of confidence in any party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
